text: Olga is our Teamlead. She prepared structure of project, wrote documents about project interfaces and made many reviews. She implemented footer and this modal about team with slider, wrote functions for working with API, refactored project in order to connect all parts together. Add to library buttons also were implemented by her.

Hanna is our Scrum master. Thanks to her, the evening standup turned into convenient and useful pastime for our team. She wrote functional for rendering cards and their styles and added notifications about errors.
Aleksandr implemented loading of trending movies, prepared style variables for all project. Implementation of logic with library buttons in header and nice favicon are also his merit.
Oleksandra implemented modal window with information about movie.
Natalia wrote functions for working with local storage and added nice button, which helps users easily get to site's top.
Maxim prepared styles for main container and implemented search functionality on our site.
Serhii implemented important part of functionality: he added pagination to our results.
Tatiana wrote styles and functionality for site's header. Prepared all images and helped with bugfixing.
